title: Watermelon Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Shizuku-chan, thanks for helping out the shop today, you’re a huge help~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Don’t mention it, I learned a lot from it too. I didn’t know that it takes that much preparation to go diving.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>It’s our responsibility to make sure everything is prepared so the people who come here can enjoy themselves, after all. But when I see the smiles on the customers’ faces, all of the fatigue goes away.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, I think I understand.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Anyway, I have some chilled watermelon as a way of thanking you for the trouble today, Shizuku-chan, would you like to eat them with me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Waaah, I’d love to! That really feels summer-like.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Doesn’t it? Apparently, today is Watermelon Day. When I heard that, I really wanted to eat one. Here, go ahead.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thanks for the treat! *Munch*.... Hnn~, it’s delicious~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I’m glad! Hey, would you like to go to the sea after we’re done eating these watermelons? The weather is beautiful today, so let’s go swimming.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Can we!? Ehehe, I think I’ll be able to enjoy summer to the fullest in just one day today~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
